Translations.Text: Balunah he loka sakala! Ami to tomadera jan'ye spasta bhasaya satarkakari.
Sutaram yara bisbasa sthapana kareche ebam satkarma kareche, tadera jan'ye ache papa marjana ebam sam'manajanaka ruyi.
Ebam yara amara ayatasamuhake byartha karara jan'ye cesta kare, tara'i doyakhera adhibasi.

Ami apanara purbe ye samasta rasula o nabi prerana karechi, tara yakhana'i kichu kalpana kareche, takhana'i sayatana tadera kalpanaya kichu misrana kare diyeche. Atahpara allaha dura kare dena sayatana ya misrana kare. Erapara allaha tamra ayatasamuhake su-pratisthita karena ebam allaha jnanamaya, prajnamaya.
E karane ye, sayatana ya misrana kare, tini ta pariksasbarupa kare dena, tadera jan'ye, yadera antare roga ache ebam yara pasanahrdaya. Gonahagarara durabarti birodhitaya lipta ache.

Ebam e karane'o ye, yaderake jnanadana kara hayeche; tara yena jane ye eta apanara palanakartara paksa theke satya; atahpara tara yena ete bisbasa stapana kare ebam tadera antara yena era prati bijayi haya. Allaha'i bisbasa sthapanakarike sarala patha pradarsana karena.
Kapherara sarbada'i sandeha posana karabe ye paryanta na tadera kache akasmikabhabe keyamata ese pare athaba ese pare tadera kache emana dibasera sasti ya theke raksara upaya ne'i.
Rajatba sedina allahara'i; tini'i tadera bicara karabena. Ata'eba yara bisbasa sthapana kare ebam satkarma sampadana kare tara neyamata purna kanane thakabe.
Ebam yara kuphari kare ebam amara ayata samuhake mithya bale tadera jan'ye lanchanakara sasti rayeche.
